<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The threshold is an Optional value, which maps to one of the 3 states:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 1 0            =&gt; threshold disabled. All emarks will be printed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 2 positive int =&gt; manual threshold by user. Remarks with hotness exceed</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                    threshold will be printed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 3 None         =&gt; &#39;auto&#39; threshold by user. The actual value is not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                    available at command line, but will be synced with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                    hotness threhold from profile summary during</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If threshold option is not specified, it is disabled by default.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Tunable parameters for passes in the default pipelines.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a6c489480556941aaffb99ac11d530ceb"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pipelinetuningoptions">PipelineTuningOptions</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a6c489480556941aaffb99ac11d530ceb">PTO</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The following callbacks deal with tasks, which normally represent the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// entire optimization and code generation pipeline for what will become a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// single native object file. Each task has a unique identifier between 0 and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// getMaxTasks()-1, which is supplied to the callback via the Task parameter.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A task represents the entire pipeline for ThinLTO and regular</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (non-parallel) LTO, but a parallel code generation task will be split into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// N tasks before code generation, where N is the parallelism level.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// LTO may decide to stop processing a task at any time, for example if the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// module is empty or if a module hook (see below) returns false. For this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// reason, the client should not expect to receive exactly getMaxTasks()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// native object files.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A module hook may be used by a linker to perform actions during the LTO</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// pipeline. For example, a linker may use this function to implement</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// -save-temps. If this function returns false, any further processing for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// that task is aborted.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Module hooks must be thread safe with respect to the linker&#39;s internal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// data structures. A module hook will never be called concurrently from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// multiple threads with the same task ID, or the same module.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Note that in out-of-process backend scenarios, none of the hooks will be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// called for ThinLTO tasks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec">ModuleHookFn</a> = std::function&lt;bool(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Task, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;)&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This module hook is called after linking (regular LTO) or loading</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (ThinLTO) the module, before modifying it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a496d67358c7f1e3a328e3ba2cda26268"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec">ModuleHookFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a496d67358c7f1e3a328e3ba2cda26268">PreOptModuleHook</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This hook is called after promoting any internal functions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (ThinLTO-specific).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a929cce8a073bdcefff79d854deedb7ed"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec">ModuleHookFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a929cce8a073bdcefff79d854deedb7ed">PostPromoteModuleHook</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This hook is called after internalizing the module.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ace0039edf4791c66d2eb99dab50fe8f9"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec">ModuleHookFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ace0039edf4791c66d2eb99dab50fe8f9">PostInternalizeModuleHook</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This hook is called after importing from other modules (ThinLTO-specific).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ad5f3c0f8fbd4bf85381e96cc672beb13"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec">ModuleHookFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ad5f3c0f8fbd4bf85381e96cc672beb13">PostImportModuleHook</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This module hook is called after optimization is complete.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ab380a759b3e8d32fc59b8f88b52fe198"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec">ModuleHookFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ab380a759b3e8d32fc59b8f88b52fe198">PostOptModuleHook</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This module hook is called before code generation. It is similar to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// PostOptModuleHook, but for parallel code generation it is called after</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// splitting the module.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ae36f72183fdb505c21cc4ca6bd48a860"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a2ac2a2331097ef0392e387a01a0844ec">ModuleHookFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#ae36f72183fdb505c21cc4ca6bd48a860">PreCodeGenModuleHook</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A combined index hook is called after all per-module indexes have been</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// combined (ThinLTO-specific). It can be used to implement -save-temps for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the combined index.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If this function returns false, any further processing for ThinLTO tasks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is aborted.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// It is called regardless of whether the backend is in-process, although it</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is not called from individual backend processes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#adfaa4b815344424627948d3bff41ad5b"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#adfaa4b815344424627948d3bff41ad5b">CombinedIndexHookFn</a> = std::function&lt;bool(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modulesummaryindex">ModuleSummaryIndex</a> &amp;Index,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/denseset">DenseSet&lt;GlobalValue::GUID&gt;</a> &amp;GUIDPreservedSymbols)&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a49ab8afb39328f912dd54a942fbdc5c1"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#adfaa4b815344424627948d3bff41ad5b">CombinedIndexHookFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a49ab8afb39328f912dd54a942fbdc5c1">CombinedIndexHook</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is a convenience function that configures this Config object to write</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// temporary files named after the given OutputFileName for each of the LTO</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// phases to disk. A client can use this function to implement -save-temps.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// FIXME: Temporary files derived from ThinLTO backends are currently named</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// after the input file name, rather than the output file name, when</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// UseInputModulePath is set to true.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Specifically, it (1) sets each of the above module hooks and the combined</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// index hook to a function that calls the hook function (if any) that was</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// present in the appropriate field when the addSaveTemps function was</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// called, and writes the module to a bitcode file with a name prefixed by</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the given output file name, and (2) creates a resolution file whose name</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is prefixed by the given output file name and sets ResolutionFile to its</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// file handle.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// SaveTempsArgs can be specified to select which temps to save.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If SaveTempsArgs is not provided, all temps are saved.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lto/config/#a4395f06e55f4b727fe0b685074821644">addSaveTemps</a>(std::string OutputFileName,</Highlight></CodeLine>
